Name: Eastern Sin
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: Fruity and slightly sweet but toned by Scotch whisky.
History: The Eastern Sin was first published in William James "Billy" Tarling's 1937 Café Royal Bar Book where he credits its creation to J. Stoneham.
Nutrition: One serving of Eastern Sin contains 233 calories
